item.title: Don't be fooled by these value traps, says investor Landsberg
item.description: Semiconductor play Texas Instruments and telecom giant Verizon are a few stocks to stay away from, investor Michael Landsberg told CNBC on Friday.

item.title: Strategas sees health care outperforming in 2025
item.description: The health care sector is poised to see a rebound and lead the market this year, according to Strategas analysts.

item.title: Tax refunds may see modest upside this season â€” and these stocks could benefit, Wolfe says
item.description: Tax season officially starts on Monday, and a group of stocks may get a boost if refunds come in higher, the firm said.

item.title: This underperforming health care stock is ready for a turnaround, according to the charts
item.description: Carter Worth breaks down the charts in Medtronic.

item.title: Morgan Stanley's favorite picks for a trade ahead of earnings
item.description: The Wall Street firm highlighted a basket of stocks, including Cloudflare and Disney, that it expects to move up after reporting earnings.
